So, I'd need to find somebody who's willing to make that commitment because it is hard work, because you are deciding on all of their material, how they're going to perform on the night, you're going to have a relationship with them, and I also think it's really really important for me that I got people I can trust in terms of their expertise-- their gut feeling-- and that's why it's a difficult decision when you're putting a team around you.
